attributes.action: Publish the conversations between Blair and Bush leading up to the Iraq war
attributes.additional_details:
The Chilcot inquiry should publish the private conversations between George Bush and Tony Blair in the lead up to the Iraq War.

The right of the British public outweighs the negligible considerations relating to national security. It is in the public's interest - as part of an accountable democratic process - that the details of these conversations be published.
